about.title: About us
about.whoWeAreText: Tracciona is a platform specialising in industrial vehicles operating in the Iberian and European market. We connect buyers and sellers of trucks, semi-trailers, vans and industrial machinery.
about.ourMissionText: To facilitate access to quality industrial vehicles through a transparent, efficient and trustworthy platform. We offer rental, sales and brokerage services for transport professionals.
about.teamText: Our team combines experience in the industrial transport sector with technological expertise to deliver the best experience for our users.

legal.title: Legal information
legal.legalNoticeText: Tracciona is a brokerage platform for industrial vehicles. The owner's identification data is available upon request at the contact email. Tracciona reserves the right to modify the content of this website at any time.
legal.termsText: These terms and conditions govern the use of the Tracciona platform. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these terms. Tracciona reserves the right to modify these terms at any time.
legal.privacyText: At Tracciona we are committed to protecting your privacy. The personal data we collect is used exclusively to provide our services and improve your experience. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
legal.cookiesText: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this may affect site functionality.
legal.aiText: Tracciona uses artificial intelligence systems for automatic translation of content into multiple languages and for AI-assisted generation of vehicle descriptions. This content is identified with a specific badge. Sellers can review and modify any AI-generated content before publication. In compliance with the EU AI Act, we inform users of the use of these systems.

disclaimer.footerText: Tracciona is a brokerage platform that facilitates contact between sellers and buyers of industrial vehicles. Tracciona is not a party to the transactions between users. Tracciona does not inspect, verify or guarantee the condition, legality or availability of the vehicles listed. Verification badges are based on documentation provided by the seller and do not constitute a guarantee. Transport, inspection and document management services are provided by independent professionals under their own responsibility.
disclaimer.badgeText: Verification is based on documentation provided by the seller. Tracciona does not physically inspect vehicles or guarantee their condition. Verification confirms that the documentation provided is consistent with the declared data.

legalUk.title: UK Terms & Conditions
legalUk.scopeText: These terms apply specifically to users accessing Tracciona from the United Kingdom. They supplement our general Terms and Conditions and comply with the UK Online Safety Act 2023, the Data Protection Act 2018 (UK GDPR), and other applicable UK legislation.
legalUk.safetyText: Tracciona is committed to providing a safe platform for the trading of industrial vehicles. We conduct regular risk assessments of illegal content as required by the UK Online Safety Act 2023. We have measures in place to prevent the listing of stolen vehicles, fraudulent advertisements, and scam content. Users can report concerning content using the flag button on any listing.
legalUk.reportingText: If you believe any content on Tracciona is illegal, fraudulent, or violates our terms, you can report it using the report button available on every vehicle listing. We will review your report within 48 hours and take appropriate action. You will be notified of the outcome. For urgent matters involving potential criminal activity, please also contact the relevant UK authorities.
legalUk.dataText: We process your personal data in accordance with the UK GDPR (Data Protection Act 2018). Your data is stored securely within the EEA. We use appropriate safeguards for any international data transfers. You have the right to access, rectify, erase, and port your personal data. Contact legal{'@'}tracciona.com for any data protection requests.
legalUk.icoText: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the UK Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) if you believe your data rights have been infringed. The ICO can be contacted at ico.org.uk.
legalUk.contactText: For UK-specific legal enquiries, please contact us at legal{'@'}tracciona.com. For general enquiries, visit our Contact page.
